title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then remove from heat.
Whisk eggs and cheeses together in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water.
Quickly mix hot pasta with pancetta, then with egg mixture.
Add pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
